title: Hacked
body: Please help me i was haked and the e-mail adress from my account is switched to the hacker i cant change my password and my e-mail adress please help me

replies.body:
**English**:

> Please contact the official Riot Games - [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
> 
> * **Category**: "I need help recovering my account"
> * **E-Mail**: (Your new email address - NOT the email address of your account!)
> 
> And fill the remaining fields of the formular.  

[Btw.: These are the german boards, you can find the english boards [here](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en).]
 
**Deutsch**:

Für den Fall dass du deutsch bist, da du auf die deutschen Boards gepostet hast:

> Bitte kontaktiere den offiziellen Riot Games - [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/requests/new).
> 
> * **Kategorie**: "Ich brauche Hilfe bei der Wiederherstellung meines Accounts"
> * **E-Mail**: (Deine neue E-Mail Adresse - NICHT die E-Mail Adresse deines Accounts!)
> 
> Und fülle den Rest des Formulars aus.
Contact the support, we can't help you there, sorry!
